pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick colors from the palette and assign on 3D view

content.raw: This was actually a choice (actually mine though, maybe @spaepcke would like to change it). I thought it would be nice to highlight the targeted item and at the same time give the user a preview of the material before they click (the same happens when assigning texture on the 3D view on branch `hitl_usability`)
content.html: This was actually a choice (actually mine though, maybe @spaepcke would like to change it). I thought it would be nice to highlight the targeted item and at the same time give the user a preview of the material before they click (the same happens when assigning texture on the 3D view on branch hitl_usability)
